rooms.description: The entrance hall leads to a large living room with Mediterranean style decor. It features a central seating area, ambient lighting, and a decorative archway to emphasize openness.

vastu_compliance.notes: North-facing entrances promote prosperity and positive energy.

rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, the dining area features a Mediterranean-style long dining table with wooden accents. The layout facilitates easy movement between rooms.

vastu_compliance.notes: East-facing spaces support mental clarity and communication.

rooms.description: The kitchen is designed with modern Mediterranean elements including tiled countertops and marble finishes. It includes a central island for preparation.

vastu_compliance.notes: Kitchen placement in the south-west enhances balance and harmony.

rooms.description: A comfortable guest room with a balcony overlooking the garden area. Decorated with Mediterranean-style furnishings.

vastu_compliance.notes: West-facing rooms encourage relaxation and creativity.

balcony.description: Spacious balcony with railings in Mediterranean style offering a pleasant outdoor space.

rooms.description: The master bedroom is spacious and includes an attached balcony to maximize natural light. The decor follows the Mediterranean theme with warm hues.

vastu_compliance.notes: North-east rooms promote positive energy flow and good health.

balcony.description: A generous balcony that provides ample outdoor space with views of the surrounding area.

rooms.description: A compact but functional living and sleeping area for domestic help, designed to be quiet and private.

vastu_compliance.notes: South-facing spaces bring calmness and stability.

rooms.description: A dedicated home office integrated into the living space for work-from-home convenience. It features a Mediterranean style desk area with proper lighting.

vastu_compliance.notes: North-west rooms support concentration and creativity.

rooms.description: A well-equipped bathroom for guest usage. Designed with contemporary fixtures.

vastu_compliance.notes: South-east bathrooms promote clarity and ease of movement.

rooms.description: A larger bathroom for master bedroom usage with a shower area and additional storage.

vastu_compliance.notes: South-east placements are ideal for functional spaces.

rooms.description: A multipurpose storage area and utility closet for cleaning supplies, ensuring a clutter-free living space.

vastu_compliance.notes: West-facing storage areas help in organizing and reducing chaos.

rooms.description: A shared balcony space overlooking the garden area. It acts as an extension of the living area.
A compact closet for storing utilities and equipment.

vastu_compliance.notes: South-west closets assist in maintaining a balanced environment.

openings.description: A large arched door providing a welcoming entrance.
Doors leading to the spacious balconies in bedrooms.
Large windows designed for natural light and ventilation.
A door opening to a small patio area used as an outdoor extension of the kitchen.
